paper_abstract: Product unit neural networks with exponential weights (PUNNs) can provide more powerful internal representation capability than traditional feed-forward neural networks. In this paper, a convergence result of the back-propagation (BP) algorithm for training PUNNs is presented. The monotonicity of the error function in the training iteration process is also guaranteed. A numerical example is given to support the theoretical findings. (c) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Convergence of BP algorithm for product unit neural networks with exponential weights
